data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.1.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2 PB 2
data.actual_result: iOS shows 8 MB while Desktop says 10 MB.
data.expected_result: Both should show 10 MB as preview limit.
data.short_description: iOS User Settings -> Text & Images tells that preview upload limit would be 8 MB while Desktop says 10 MB
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your user settings with your iOS device - Open the menu "Text & Images" - Observe the preview upload limit below the option "When uploaded directly to Discord" - Compare it with the Desktop version
